page.title: 17THE CHILDRENS' DAY
page.content: {Nicholas Wight aged 8} I walk to school and play football. I do geography or science or maths till lunchtime. I like doing "Dragon World" on the computer. At 3.30 I go home and play or watch the video or go to the cubs in Thirsk. {Anna Smith aged 13} I catch the school bus which comes about 8.15, it goes round 4 villages picking up children for Thirsk School. I take a packed lunch. My favourite lesson is geography. On Thursday I go to Athletic Club at school. On Sunday I go riding. {Lucinda Thomas aged 11} I came to school in the taxi. I played football. Before lunch I did maths,had assembly and wrote a story. After lunch I made a model dragon. When I got home I played on the Village Green
